SENT.plain: We report on a 14-year-old girl with the achondroplasia-hypochondroplasia complex
This patient has been reported previously [McKusick et al, 1973], and we offer an update on her condition
The patient has clinical features different from both achondroplasia and hypochondroplasia and is mentally retarded
Radiological changes, which have occurred over 14 years, are included
